feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Cloud
feed.subtitle: ABAP Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Reading child entity in parent entity's determination doesn't work
entry.content:
I am trying to update the total number of items in child entity (Material) in a field in parent entity (Catalogue), however, the read statment returns empty rows for the child entity. How can I fix this, I want to get the count of all the rows in the child entity and update this number in a field in parent entity. Following is the behavior definition and implementation. Thanks.

managed implementation in class zbp_i_catalogue unique;
strict ( 2 );
with draft;

define behavior for zI_catalogue //alias <alias_name>
persistent table zcatalogue
draft table zcatalogue_dr
lock master total etag LastChangedAt
authorization master ( global )
{

  create ( authorization : global );
  update;
  delete;

  field ( readonly, numbering : managed ) CatalogueId;
  field ( readonly ) CategoryDescription, Active, TotalItems, Version,
  CreatedAt, CreatedBy, LastChangedAt, LastChangedBy;

  association _materials { create; with draft; }

  determination saveTotalItems on save { create; }

  draft action Activate optimized;
  draft action Discard;
  draft action Edit;
  draft action Resume;
  draft determine action Prepare;

  mapping for zcatalogue
    {
      CatalogueId         = catalogue_id;
      Name                = name;
      Description         = description;
      Category            = category;
      CategoryDescription = category_description;
      Active              = active;
      TotalItems          = total_items;
      Version             = version;
      ValidFrom           = valid_from;
      ValidTo             = valid_to;
      LastChangedAt       = last_changed_at;
      LastChangedBy       = last_changed_by;
      CreatedBy           = created_by;
      CreatedAt           = created_at;
    }
}

define behavior for zI_material //alias <alias_name>
persistent table zmaterial
draft table zmaterial_dr
lock dependent by _catalogue
authorization dependent by _catalogue
{
  update;
  delete;
  field ( readonly, numbering : managed ) MaterialId;
  field ( readonly ) CatalogueId, CatalogueName, CreatedAt, CreatedBy, LastChangedAt, LastChangedBy;
  
  association _catalogue { with draft; }

  mapping for zmaterial
    {
      MaterialId    = material_id;
      CatalogueId   = catalogue_id;
      CatalogueName = catalogue_name;
      Description   = description;
      Price         = price;
      Currency      = currency;
      Uom           = uom;
      LastChangedAt = last_changed_at;
      LastChangedBy = last_changed_by;
      CreatedBy     = created_by;
      CreatedAt     = created_at;
    }
}
CLASS lhc_zI_catalogue DEFINITION INHERITING FROM cl_abap_behavior_handler.
  PRIVATE SECTION.

    METHODS saveTotalItems FOR DETERMINE ON SAVE
      IMPORTING keys FOR zI_catalogue~saveTotalItems.

ENDCLASS.

CLASS lhc_zI_catalogue IMPLEMENTATION.

  METHOD saveTotalItems.

    READ ENTITIES OF zI_catalogue IN LOCAL MODE
        ENTITY zI_material
        ALL FIELDS WITH VALUE #(
            FOR key IN keys (
                CatalogueId = key-CatalogueId
            )
        )
        RESULT DATA(lt_materials).

    IF lt_materials IS NOT INITIAL.

      MODIFY ENTITIES OF zI_catalogue IN LOCAL MODE
      ENTITY zI_catalogue
      UPDATE FIELDS ( TotalItems )
      WITH VALUE #( FOR _key IN keys ( %tky = _key-%tky TotalItems = lines( lt_materials ) ) ).

    ENDIF.
  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.

entry.title: Is there any update on ABAP RAP native capability to model associations between xBO in UI scenarios?
entry.content:
Hi SAP community,

Is there any update on the native ABAP RAP support for xBO navigation and modelling in case of creating Fiori Elements based application using ABAP and CDS annotations without touching the UI5 files in BAS?

In BOPF we had xBO scenarios and we could navigate and do our stuff so, RAP BO should have the same capability. As in many cases customers would like to have that kind of navigation and currently it is possible but w/o native ABAP RAP support. So, if it is there can you share any tutorials or documentation and if not can anyone help understand  if this is in the roadmap?

Best,

Prasenjit Singh Bist

entry.title: How to validate foreign key in internal table by using code?
entry.content: I have a problem with uploading data from excel to an internal table but I want to check that the data in the field I upload must contain data corresponding to that foreign key. Can someone help me how to check that the uploaded data must match the data in the foreign key in the internal table?

entry.title: Unable to login to ABAP Cloud from eclipse
entry.content:
I have configured an ABAP project in eclipse and used for some days 
suddenly it started asking for authorization, not sure what it is 

After this I navigated to browser and provided user and password for universal ID

Post this it usually shows screen - login success 
But now it shows below pop up and no luck in trying with universal id credentials 

Why am i getting this and what credentials needs to be provided here?

entry.title: Schedule RAP Service in BTP Job Scheduler
entry.content:
We have a ABAP cloud system where we have a created a RAP Application. Its a very basic app with a GET operation only.
Our main agenda is to explore the usage of BTP Job scheduler. I am aware that CAPM application can be scheduled easily in Job scheduler.

Kindly let me know if it is possible to schedule RAP Service as a job in Job scheduler. If yes, please help with some working steps for the same.

entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Need help in ABAP code for deleting the records based in fiscal years period in adso ZWB_FX01 (target)if the (ZWB_FX04) source contains the fiscal year period that correspoing fiscal year periods data to be deleted from the target before loading from the source.

Please help.

entry.title: Are any RAP BO Reflection APIs available in BTP ABAP environment?
entry.content:
Hello, colleagues. 

Does anyone know any cloud ready reflection API for RAP BO? Are there any plans to make any reflection API for RAP BO?

By the way, class CL_ABAP_BEHVDESCR doesn't have release contract and I can't use it.  Also, the class seems not fully comply with my tasks (read all action for BDEF).

Futhermore, I've tried XCO library, it has quite poor reading capabilities. XCO generation part doesn't give possibility to study existing BDEF at all. Also I've tried classes for abapGIT serialization, I wasn't successful too(not released).

If you know the API, please point out how to get all actions defined in BDEF. 

P.S. It would be great to get something really powerfull to read and parse all BDEF, to get all nodes or all RAP actions or RAP functions etc.

Thanks.

entry.title: S/4 Cloud: Local Event Consumption not getting triggered
entry.content:
Hi community,

we are on a S/4H Cloud system and we want to consume a standard business event locally.

This is described here (creating a class which is defined for events of a business object interface + a local class with a method to consume a certain event of it):
https://help.sap.com/docs/abap-cloud/abap-rap/business-event-consumption?locale=en-US

Unfortunately the handler method never gets called.

Is there something we are missing? Something to activate a certain event?

I'm used to work with event mesh on BTP (where stuff like communication arrangement SAP_COM_0092, channel binding etc. is necessary on the system).  I thought that local consumption (without going to BTP Event Mesh) does not need anything additional (only a class with a method which is handling the event). Am I wrong?

Thank you
Daniel

entry.title: CL_ABAP_PARALLEL - Fire and forget scenario with an OData implementation/Any object
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I have a usecase where a expensive process have to be pushed in background using CL_ABAP_PARALLEL.
System: S4hana 2022 onpremise
i used run/ run_inst but it waits for all the work process to finish. I could see "START_INST_IN_BACKGROUND" but i am not sure this will server the purpose.

My OData caller is expecting the response immediately and time consuming process should process in background


Note: we are looking for a released api.. clean core journey it is!!!

Regards,
Vishnu

entry.title: Do not display deleted line item in sap adobe form output using SAP S4 using Gateway service
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am using SAP gateway service to develope SAP ADOBE form using the interface i want to omit the deleted line item in form output.

I am following the below steps to produce form output.

1. Create PO with 3 line items and save it.

2. Delete 1 line item from the PO and approve it using the Front End and corresponding output is generated in which i have omited    the deleted line item so the output contains 2 line items.

3. Now i change the PO after apprval and delete another line item this time for the change po i should get only the recently deleted line item in the Change PO output i.e only 2 line items.

Could you please let me know from which table in SAP S4 could i use to add logic.

entry.content:

I have one requirement to hide Purchase Order Output Header Ship-to Address and display it at line item level only if any line item is having different address from the other line item address.

SAP has provided a note 3025164 - Purchase Order Output Header Ship-to Address  but i need to implement the solution could you please give me input as to where should i make changes and code etc.

i am using SAP GW service to develope the adobe form

Thanks

entry.title: ABAP RAP - Date field value help with future dates disabled?
entry.content:
Hello SAP ABAP RAP Experts,

Is it possible to disable the future dates in the value help of a date field in SAP RAP application?

For example, if today is 22nd July 2025, the value help should show the future dates, i.e. 22nd July onwards as greyed out/disabled and therefore not allowing the user to select future dates.

Just FYI. We are currently handling this requirement based on a validation on save. Is there any other efficient way of handling this?

Thanks!

entry.title: Scalar functions on CDS views
entry.content:
I have created and defined a scalar function called ZWBS_Description.

When implementing the function in the method returnWbsDescription in the corresponding amdp class, the method configuration that provides the result is already set ( in the scalar function definition and implementation reference).

I now would like to create the return value for my scalar function.
(The datasource, is a cds view entity ( based on an SAP table).)

My issue is, that I can't make a select on a CDS view. I get the following error.

In a table function the client dependency can be controlled, but I don't think that is possible for a scalar function. ( The annotation is not allowed. Makes sense, as the client field is always set in a CDS view in the background.)

I have taken a deep dive in the documentation
ABAP CDS - Scalar Functions | ABAP Keyword Documentation
but I can't find any solution regarding that.

My question is now, is it even possible to use a CDS view as a data source?
And on top of that, why (again) are we limited to SQLScript instead if ABAP SQL ?


More background information

entry.title: Possibility for Mass Production Order Confirmation in Foreground from template in SAP Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement, where users perform "Mass Confirmation of production order's" through Excel template. Also, the confirmation screen - CO11N have certain validations (using Badi) in place for the order to be confirmed.

Each order is confirmed in foreground, allowing users to manipulate "Goods movement data - yield Qty, posting date, Storage location, Execution date, Component Qty" to be within validations placed. This is possible in ECC.

Requirement in Public cloud system:

1) User should be able to upload list of Production orders with other info through Template.

2) User should perform confirmation in the foreground with data picked from template and also allowing to change on screen confirmation data.

Has anyone achieved or any possible leads for the same to be replicated in SAP Public Cloud environment?

Thankyou.

entry.title: Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team,
entry.content:
Dear SAP BTP Trial Support Team/ ABAP TEAM,

Iâ€™m currently using the SAP BTP ABAP Environment trial (User ID: GE202076), and Iâ€™m facing persistent activation issues with a CDS view.

Iâ€™ve followed all RAP and CDS conventions using `define root view entity` based on the recommended replacement entity `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC`.

However, every attempt to activate the CDS fails with errors like:

- The column BUSINESSUSER is unknown

- The column EMAILADDRESS is unknown

- The column ISLOCKED is unknown

- The column LOGONNAME is unknown

Iâ€™ve also tried switching to fields like `firstname`, `lastname`, `emailaddress`, and `businesspartner`, but the activation consistently failsâ€”even in newly created CDS views with correct templates and package setup.

Iâ€™ve followed every clean step using Eclipse ADT, project `TDI_EN`, and package `ZGE202076A`, and validated field names via `Ctrl + Space` in the Outline view.

Could you please help me:

  1. Confirm the available fields in `I_BUSINESSUSERBASIC` in my trial tenant 
  2. Identify whether this is a metadata replication/cache issue 
  3. Suggest if another CDS (like `I_EMPLOYEESIMPLE` or similar) should be used instead

Looking forward to your guidance.

Thanks

Best regards, 

**Madhulatha Pelluri**

entry.title: BADI Recommendation for Vendor Balance Validation in FB65 in public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have a business requirement where users should be allowed to post an FB65 transaction (Create Incoming Invoice) only if the vendor has a NIL or debit balance (that is, the vendor balance must be greater than or equal to zero).

Could you please advise which BADI can be used to implement this validation

Thanks & Regards

Dedipya
